title: Enable dropdown scrolling and fix workout page

requirements.summary: Make all dropdown menus scrollable when content exceeds viewport height
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown menus display a scrollbar when content height exceeds the container
Users can scroll through all available options in exercise selection dropdowns
Dropdown remains positioned correctly and does not overflow the viewport

file_operations.description: Update exercise selection dropdown to include max-height constraint with overflow-y-auto for scrollable behavior when exercise list exceeds viewport height. Ensure dropdown container uses proper positioning and z-index to prevent viewport overflow.

Update exercise selection dropdown to include max-height constraint with overflow-y-auto for scrollable behavior. Apply consistent styling with WorkoutForm dropdown to maintain dark theme and ensure proper scroll functionality when exercise list is long.

If using shadcn/ui Select component, modify SelectContent to include max-height and overflow-y-auto classes. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Ensure SelectViewport or content wrapper has scrollable container properties that work across all dropdown instances in the app.

requirements.summary: Fix issues on the workout page to ensure proper functionality and display
acceptanceCriteria: User can navigate and interact with workout features as intended

file_operations.description: Update WorkoutsList page to properly fetch and display workout data using the useWorkouts query hook. Replace empty state implementation with actual workout list rendering that shows workout cards with name, exercise count, and navigation to detail view. Add error handling for failed queries.

Enhance WorkoutDetail page to display full workout information including exercise names by fetching exercise details for each exerciseId in the workout. Add edit and delete functionality with proper navigation. Handle loading and error states appropriately.

Verify workout-related routes are properly configured in the router, including WorkoutsList, WorkoutDetail, and WorkoutForm routes. Ensure route parameters for workout ID are correctly defined and navigation paths are consistent across the application.
